title: move casts helpers into a separate repo/project
body:
since could be of utility to others, and we could benefit from wider adoption/contributions

proposed names from top of the head
- autocast (bad, collides with many other projects)
- CastLad ;-) 

For the summary, we have:
- all those `tools/cast*` scripts (and bash settings for uniform cmdline appearance) which should migrate into a separate repository/project (could be under datalad/ organization or elsewhere).
- `docs/casts/*.sh` - our cast scripts, majority of which are "rendered" as 
   - asciinemas (by `tools/cast2asciinema`) and shell scripts (by `tools/cast2script`) and published (by including them under https://github.com/datalad/datalad.org/tree/master/content/asciicast) on http://datalad.org/features.html 
   - rst (by `tools/cast2rst`) and published under `docs/source/usecases/` of this repository
- Some of the casting scripts (`tools/cast2narration`) might not work as originally intended on current version of the cast scripts , since initially developed before casts were tuned up for newly added casting scripts, and we have no tests for them
